aai_swe.title: AssemblyAI
aai_swe.subtitle: Software Engineer
bullets: Built data lakehouse intake pipeline on Dataproc (Beam) to ingest and store 12.5 million hours of audio data (GCS), queryable via associated metadata (BigTable/BigQuery)

Set up PySpark infrastructure, orchestrated on Apache Airflow and executed via Dataproc, to fulfill ad-hoc big data transformation requests from Research team
  • Transcoding/segmentation/analysis of 500+ TB of audio data
Developed heuristic filters to identify high-quality audio transcripts to use as training data
Implemented features of Python SDK for production transcription API

meta_swe.title: Meta Platforms
meta_swe.subtitle: Software Engineer
bullets: Developed configurable data pipeline platform to generate company-critical integrity metrics using Python, SQL, and Hack (PHP)

Built infrastructure that powered the Integrity Guardrails program: a company-wide initiative to empower product teams to detect unwanted regressions in integrity metrics before launching new features
  • Flagship metrics owned by our team were included in all product experiments; roughly 10,000 experiments per month
  • Platform allowed 15+ teams to configure 100+ custom metrics for experimentation

Proposed and led year-long architecture consolidation of three different machine-learning-based measurement systems by breaking them down into modular components
  • Resulted in 75% compute savings in aggregate
  • Reduction of codebase fragmentation led to a more sustainable developer environment
Built Python framework for elegantly managing complex dynamic data pipeline DAGs with thousands of nodes
Built prototype of a graph visualization tool using Cytoscape.js to display our complex ecosystem of configs, pipelines, tables, code files, and asset ownership

meta_intern.title: Meta Platforms (Facebook)
meta_intern.subtitle: Software Engineering Intern
bullets: Built internal web console using React for the Search Indexing Infrastructure team to monitor and repair data indexing pipelines
Wrote and deployed an automated service in Python for intelligent pipeline failure detection and notification
Tools are still in use by employees to oversee the ingestion of over 1.2 petabytes of data every week

semeru.title: SEMERU Lab
semeru.subtitle: Research Assistant
bullets: Designed and implemented a modular tool in Python for executing and evaluating 10 differnent information retrieval techniques on arbitrary codebases
Converted a serial document processing system to a parallel one, improving compuation time by ~40x
Built web-scraping tool to collect data for machine learning model training
publications: Improving the Effectiveness of Traceability Link Recovery using Hierarchical Bayesian Networks
Learning to Identify Security- Related Issues Using Convolutional Neural Networks

chordsight.title: Chordsight
chordsight.description: Browser-based realtime MIDI visualization tool to display chord names and guitar patterns, built in Typescript using React

resume.title: Mild
resume.description: Lightweight HTML template preprocessor built in Python (used to create this resume!)

cyc.title: Cyc
cyc.description: Experimental calendar built using Solid.js where cycles are the primary abstraction, with an emphasis on harmonization of these cycles
